entry.title: https://github.com/input-output-hk/plutus-pioneer-program
entry.content: This repository hosts the lectures of the Plutus Pioneers Program. This program is a training course that the IOG Education Team provides to recruit and train software developers in Plutus, the native smart contract language for the Cardano ecosystem.
